2024 年 1 月 28 日星期日 18:01:25 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
《宇宙》/《雕像》/《解放》|嗡嗡声嗡嗡声Electro-pop artist Buzz unfurls an enchanting, genre-bending performance of three original songs. 《宇宙》/《雕像》/《解放》|嗡嗡声Electro-pop artist Buzz unfurls an enchanting, genre-bending performance of three original songs. https://www.ted.com/talks/buzz_universe_statues_liberation?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:124189 124189 Fri, 26 Jan 2024 22:23:07 +0000高等教育不00:10:08泰德
一块简单的砖头能成为下一个伟大的电池吗？ |约翰·奥唐纳约翰·奥唐纳The world relies on manufacturing, and manufacturing relies on heat — a massive contributor to global carbon emissions, responsible for a quarter of the world's fossil fuel use. Energy entrepreneur John O'Donnell has figured out a better, cleaner way to generate the heat we need to make the stuff we want. Learn how his team turned simple bricks and iron wire into a powerful, unconventional "heat battery" that could deliver industrial heat at scale without the emissions — and why he thinks electrified industrial heat is the next trillion-dollar industry.一块简单的砖头能成为下一个伟大的电池吗？ |约翰·奥唐纳The world relies on manufacturing, and manufacturing relies on heat — a massive contributor to global carbon emissions, responsible for a quarter of the world's fossil fuel use. Energy entrepreneur John O'Donnell has figured out a better, cleaner way to generate the heat we need to make the stuff we want. Learn how his team turned simple bricks and iron wire into a powerful, unconventional "heat battery" that could deliver industrial heat at scale without the emissions — and why he thinks electrified industrial heat is the next trillion-dollar industry. https://www.ted.com/talks/john_o_donnell_can_a_simple_brick_be_the_next_great_battery?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119530 119530 Thu, 25 Jan 2024 16:06:20 +0000高等教育不00:09:44泰德
为领导者提供关于创建归属感文化的建议|梅洛妮·D·帕克梅洛妮·D·帕克Google's chief diversity officer Melonie D. Parker joins journalist and host of the "TED Tech" podcast Sherrell Dorsey for a conversation on fostering belonging and opportunity in the workplace. Learn more about how companies can sustainably promote diversity, equity and inclusion — and why you should aim to "add in," not "fit in."为领导者提供关于创建归属感文化的建议|梅洛妮·D·帕克Google's chief diversity officer Melonie D. Parker joins journalist and host of the "TED Tech" podcast Sherrell Dorsey for a conversation on fostering belonging and opportunity in the workplace. 你的创造力可以帮助保护民主 |索菲亚·翁格莱索菲亚·翁格莱"Democracy is more fun and inviting when you take it into your own hands," says creator and activist Sofia Ongele. Sharing how she's using coding and social media to defend democracy, Ongele invites us to identify our own creative superpowers — whether it's community organizing, making music or telling stories — and use them to cause a ruckus and bring movements to life.你的创造力可以帮助保护民主 |索菲亚·翁格莱"Democracy is more fun and inviting when you take it into your own hands," says creator and activist Sofia Ongele. Sharing how she's using coding and social media to defend democracy, Ongele invites us to identify our own creative superpowers — whether it's community organizing, making music or telling stories — and use them to cause a ruckus and bring movements to life. https://www.ted.com/talks/sofia_ongele_your_creative_superpowers_can_help_protect_democracy?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:122557 122557 Tue, 23 Jan 2024 15:45:34 +0000高等教育不00:09:49泰德
肠道微生物控制你的性格吗？ |凯瑟琳·麦考利夫凯瑟琳·麦考利夫Biologist Kathleen McAuliffe dives into new research that suggests certain bacteria in your gut can influence major parts of who you are, from your personality to life-changing neurological disorders. Learn more about how this emerging science could change how we treat disease — and discover the impact of your internal microbial makeup on your mood, weight and more.肠道微生物控制你的性格吗？ |凯瑟琳·麦考利夫Biologist Kathleen McAuliffe dives into new research that suggests certain bacteria in your gut can influence major parts of who you are, from your personality to life-changing neurological disorders. 电影如何改变我们看待世界的方式艾娃·杜威内艾娃·杜威内"People told me this was an unadaptable book, so the only logical thing to do was to try to adapt it," says writer, producer and filmmaker Ava DuVernay of her work taking the award-winning title "Caste" from page to screen. In conversation with Pat Mitchell, DuVernay talks about the resulting film, "Origin," and discusses her process for turning ideas into pictures that pack a punch.电影如何改变我们看待世界的方式艾娃·杜威内"People told me this was an unadaptable book, so the only logical thing to do was to try to adapt it," says writer, producer and filmmaker Ava DuVernay of her work taking the award-winning title "Caste" from page to screen. In conversation with Pat Mitchell, DuVernay talks about the resulting film, "Origin," and discusses her process for turning ideas into pictures that pack a punch. https://www.ted.com/talks/ava_duvernay_how_film_changes_the_way_we_see_the_world?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:122555 122555 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 15:55:59 +0000高等教育不00:19:54泰德
为正义而战——即使你不能活着看到它 |戈尔里兹·卢西纳戈尔里兹·卢西纳Storyteller Golriz Lucina recounts how the historic sacrifice of Iranian 19th-century poet and mystic Táhirih planted the seeds for the "Woman, Life, Freedom" protests today, offering an inspiring lesson in the value of acting with conviction — even if we don't live to see the results.为正义而战——即使你不能活着看到它 |戈尔里兹·卢西纳Storyteller Golriz Lucina recounts how the historic sacrifice of Iranian 19th-century poet and mystic Táhirih planted the seeds for the "Woman, Life, Freedom" protests today, offering an inspiring lesson in the value of acting with conviction — even if we don't live to see the results. https://www.ted.com/talks/golriz_lucina_fight_for_justice_even_if_you_don_t_live_to_see_it?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:123281 123281 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 15:59:12 +0000高等教育不00:07:55泰德
如果广告是诚实的怎么办？ |西尔维斯特·乔克西尔维斯特·乔克After years of brand building, marketing veteran Sylvester Chauke realized that his industry had sold the world on overconsumption, with devastating consequences. He shares how marketers could instead promote sustainability with "honest ads" that do right by the planet and encourage people to think twice before buying.如果广告是诚实的怎么办？ |西尔维斯特·乔克After years of brand building, marketing veteran Sylvester Chauke realized that his industry had sold the world on overconsumption, with devastating consequences. 野生动物之美——以及保护野生动物的艺术呼吁|伊莎贝拉柯克兰伊莎贝拉柯克兰"I think of my paintings as alarm clocks," says artist Isabella Kirkland. "They're reminders of what's at stake; the only problem is we keep pushing the snooze button." Investigating humanity's relationship to nature, she shares work that takes a creative stand against ecological despair — and quietly urges climate action through permanent images of vanishing wildlife.野生动物之美——以及保护野生动物的艺术呼吁|伊莎贝拉柯克兰"I think of my paintings as alarm clocks," says artist Isabella Kirkland. "They're reminders of what's at stake; the only problem is we keep pushing the snooze button." Investigating humanity's relationship to nature, she shares work that takes a creative stand against ecological despair — and quietly urges climate action through permanent images of vanishing wildlife. https://www.ted.com/talks/isabella_kirkland_the_beauty_of_wildlife_and_an_artistic_call_to_protect_it?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118716 118716 Tue, 16 Jan 2024 15:55:47 +0000高等教育不00:08:38泰德
让好奇心引领|亚拉·沙希迪亚拉·沙希迪Don't second-guess what "distracts" you, says actor-producer Yara Shahidi; that's your curiosity coming through. The star of hit shows like "black-ish" and "grown-ish" tells how she learned to spot clues to her own future — and how you can, too.让好奇心引领|亚拉·沙希迪Don't second-guess what "distracts" you, says actor-producer Yara Shahidi; that's your curiosity coming through. 人工智能可以给你 X 光视力吗？ |塔拉·博鲁沙基塔拉·博鲁沙基What if a robot could find and deliver your lost phone? AI researcher Tara Boroushaki presents how she's using wireless signals and sensors to create AI-powered goggles with "X-ray vision," creating a dynamic new tool with applications from improving efficiency in commercial warehouses to aiding emergency rescues.人工智能可以给你 X 光视力吗？ |塔拉·博鲁沙基What if a robot could find and deliver your lost phone?
